___businessPremisesRenovationAllowance.description: Business Premises Renovation Allowance if converting or renovating unused qualifying business premises
___businessPremisesRenovationAllowance.title: Business Premises Renovation Allowance

___allowanceOnSales.description: Allowances on sale or cessation of business use (where you have disposed of assets for less than their tax value)
___allowanceOnSales.title: Allowances on sales

___capitalAllowanceSpecialRatePool.description: Capital allowances at 8% on equipment, including cars with higher CO2 emissions
___capitalAllowanceSpecialRatePool.title: Capital allowance special rate pool

___capitalAllowanceMainPool.description: Capital allowances at 18% on equipment, including cars with lower CO2 emissions
___capitalAllowanceMainPool.title: Capital allowance main pool

___annualInvestmentAllowance.description: Annual investment allowance on items that qualify up to the AIA amount
___annualInvestmentAllowance.title: Annual investment allowance

___zeroEmissionGoodsVehicleAllowance.description: Zero emission goods vehicle allowance for goods vehicles purchased for business use
___zeroEmissionGoodsVehicleAllowance.title: Zero emission goods vehicle allowance

___averagingAdjustment.description:
Averaging adjustment (only for farmers, market gardeners and creators of literary or artistic works)
– if the adjustment needs to be taken off the profit figure, this should be negative
___averagingAdjustment.title: Averaging adjustment

___outstandingBusinessIncome.description: Any other business income not included in other fields
___outstandingBusinessIncome.title: Outstanding business income

___accountingAdjustment.description: Adjustment for change of accounting practice
___accountingAdjustment.title: Accounting adjustment

___goodsAndServicesOwnUse.description: Value of the normal sale price of goods or stock have been taken out of the business.
___goodsAndServicesOwnUse.title: Goods and services own use

___balancingChargeBPRA.description: Balancing charge on sale or cessation of business use (only where Business Premises Renovation Allowance has been claimed)
___balancingChargeBPRA.title: Balancing charge BPRA

___basisAdjustment.description: If your basis period is not the same as your accounting period, enter the adjustment needed to arrive at the profit or loss for the basis period – if the adjustment needs to be taken off the profit figure, this should be negative
___basisAdjustment.title: Basis adjustment

___balancingChargeOther.description: Balancing charge on sale or cessation of business use (where you have disposed of assets for more than their tax value)
___balancingChargeOther.title: Balancing charge Other

___includedNonTaxableProfits.description: Income, receipts and other profits included in business income or expenses but not taxable as business profits
___includedNonTaxableProfits.title: Included not-taxable profits

___lossBroughtForward.description: Loss brought forward from earlier years set off against this year’s profits
___lossBroughtForward.title: Loss brought forward
